msbt.message: Happy birthday again! I'm sending along the present you couldn't take home from the party. If I know you—and I think I do—it'll suit your tastes quite nicely. Well, my dear, here's to another wonderful year!
Here's the gift I meant to give you at your party. A birthday without a present is like cake without the frosting! And we can't have that! Anyway, I selected it myself, so rest assured it's fabulous.
Happy birthday, my dear! Here's your present. I know it's a wee bit late, but not to worry... It simply means we can celebrate your birthday even longer! May your next 365 days be utterly marvelous!

Happy birthday! I'm so glad you enjoyed the party. Breaking open a piñata is quite thrilling, isn't it? Anyhoo, as promised, I'm sending along the cupcakes you couldn't take home with you. They're delish!
I hope you had fun at the party! I'm sending you the cupcakes from the piñata. You can share them with friends...or eat them all yourself. It's up to you, darling. Just listen to your stomach. Ha!

I never tire of attending birthday parties. I already can't wait for your next one! Here are the piñata cupcakes I promised to send. Now, don't eat too many. Oh, never mind that. Go ahead and live a little!

You are such a gem for sharing your birthday cupcakes with me! And I'm sorry it's a teensy bit late, but here's the present I couldn't give you earlier. I don't know if it'll be to your liking, but give it a whirl!

I wanted to thank you for earlier. When you shared your birthday cupcake with me, well, it felt like a real bonding moment. Anyhoo, I'm sending along the present you couldn't carry. I think you'll like it!
Happiest of birthdays, darling! I'm sending you the present you couldn't carry earlier. I do hope you like it! Tell me, what did the others get you? Anything exciting? A pair of socks, perhaps? Ha!
